verses.roman:
eta śuni' mahāprabhu hāsite lāgilā
bolāiyā kamalākānte prasanna ha-ilā

synonyms: eta śuni'-thus hearing; mahāprabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; hāsite—to laugh; lāgilā—began; bolāiyā—calling; kamalākānte—unto Kamalākānta; prasanna—satisfied; ha-ilā—became.
translation: Hearing this, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu laughed with satisfaction and immediately called Kamalākānta Viśvāsa.
